amendment.description: To ensure continuity of the search and rescue capabilities of the Federal Government.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3221 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3221 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Lott. (consideration: CR S6717-6718; text: CR S6718) To ensure continuity of the search and rescue capabilities of the Federal Government.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3221 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3221 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Lott.
